title: Drawing, Wady el-Arabah: View across the Hills and Plain toward the Mountains, February 20, 1868
title_raw: Wady el-Arabah: View across the Hills and Plain toward the Mountains
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at various locations:  snow / soft greenish sky mountains blue and gold gray / stony; and at bottom right: Plain streaked with reddish-brown green / in wadys rich green / streaked with shadows.

Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at various locations:  Distant / splendidly broken / gray / El Yemen / Feb (19 struck out) 20.  [Continues on 1917-4-174 with right part of of this view]
description:
Recto: Horizontal view across the hills and plains toward mountain ranges, with a flock grazing upon a hill in the right middleground.

Verso: Horizontal view with the banks at left and in the rear, and mountains in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Wady el-Arabah: View across the Hills and Plain toward the Mountains, February 20, 1868. Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper. 
Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-173
